A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Had the chance\, the rare chance to give a beloved character a noble exit\, instead the thunderous dud that we got is nothing but an insult to all fans of the original trilogy . Moves into Godfather 3 type of regret and dissatisfaction. Just don't understand why this was allowed \,the minute Lucas signed away his legendary creation this was inevitable ...killing off the past in such a neffrctual callous way.
